      • formatBigDecimal

        public static java.math.BigDecimal formatBigDecimal(java.math.BigDecimal value,
                                    double minimumScientificValue,
                                    int scientificDecimalPlaces)
        Helper method to format BigDecimals so their toString() follows a format
        Parameters:
        value -
        minimumScientificValue - All values below this amount will appear normal. Any values above will be in scientific notation
        scientificDecimalPlaces - The number of decimal places for scientific values
        Returns:

      • hasPlayer

        public static boolean hasPlayer(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
        Checks if the economy has an account for a player. If the player has logged in, then an account is automatically created for them.
